1062812238401150987.text: In my career I've only ever seen two ways of organizing human endeavor. One is hierarchy, fiefdoms, command-and-control, leading to arbitrary power structures, power struggles, and rent seeking. The other is anarchy, chaos, decentralization, horribly inefficient. I choose chaos.

1042832087793975297.text:
A Brief History of Philosophy
1. Socrates deletes his account.
2. Plato posts screenshots of Socrates.
3. Aristotle unfollows Plato.
4. Aquinas retweets Jesus.
5. Descartes mutes Aquinas.
6. Locke mutes Descartes.
7. Kant unfollows Locke and Descartes.
8. Hegel subtweets Kant.

Crypto: where should we apply market engineering? 

DAOs: where should we apply governance/democracy engineering?

971441031395897347.text:
She told a story to her friend.

He wrote it down in code.

Another person came along to put it on a node.

Then bits and bytes were valued, used and sold.

Soon the idea of banking, looked slow, silly or old.

"Can't have that" said the bureaucrat, "let's lock them in the cold."

970653385648205824.text:
Crypto requires understanding of:

1. Technology
2. Economics
3. Business
4. Cryptography
5. Finance
6. Cybersecurity
7. Monetary Policy
8. Securities law
9. Psychology
10. Sociology
11. Geo-politics
12. History

It pays to be well-rounded in this new world.

1115994443373514754.text: 6) Early days where answer still unclear. IMO turning code and algos into DAOs a 1st step to formalizing power & rent seeking . But the fight over technology is always political before it is technical. Time to wake up to the coming realities and build an alternative together!

1115994441490358272.text: 5) Intangible assets are a huge & increasing share of the economy. Shared ownership of the algos is mission critical for humanity. DAOs must not be allowed to concentrate further wealth but to give back to all and increase coordination. How do we fight back?

1115994439917494273.text: 4) FB steps in and learns from the best code out there to deploy contracts on Messenger/FB/Insta/WhatsApp to manage DAOs with your contact/friend list. Added bonus they lobby govs to clamp down on dark daos by promoting a centralizated KYC bottleneck (already have your identity)

1115994438071914496.text: 3) DAO are FOSS powered decentralized orgs but the appearance of « dark DAOs » freaks out states. DOs with KYC and semi autonomy become legal in some jurisdictions. Turn into a new vehicle to manage tokenized assets (physical or intangible) by F500 and 0.1%, for the rest of us..

1115994436339687424.text: 2) The most logical move after a stablecoin payment solution to lock users inside their economy                    -> « organize and collaborate with your friends as a company, a foundation or a limited time partnership (say for an event) ». So how does FB get there?

it sprawls on its divan eating loukoum & entertaining heretical notions, one hand inside its baggy trousers.

A South China Sea of the mind
